descriptionHtml:
[left]This mod add stand-alone  follower.Cacilie is remarkable for Heavy Armor and Two hand.

This mod is set for Legendary mode so if you use another mode gamebalance might be destructed.-Location[font=Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif][color=#d5d4d4]Sleeping giant inn[/color][/font]-Installation-Recommend the installation Mod Organizer or NMM. 


I do not recommend the manual installation very much.
